__e: Well, after your dad went to sleep, did you happen to see or hear anything outside?
Are you sure you didn't see or hear anything?
Come on, dog. I mean, if you didn't hear something there, I mean...
I don't think you heard what I said.
You heard what he said, and you've been through what he went through.
But she didn't. You listened to what she wanted, not what you wanted for her.
You heard what he said, and you've been through what he went through.
But I know one thing that he listened to his heart all his life.
But she didn't. You listened to what she wanted, not what you wanted for her.
It can't be the first time you've heard that stuff.
No this not good news Mom, did you miss the part about him murdering me.
And you got that because you listened to everyone, which you did because you listened to me.
You all heard the same thing I did, so what's to talk about?
